ygData.subject: Re: EQ and Laptops
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently got to play EQ on a NEC READY 440T and it ran pretty good ... From:  To:  Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
I recently got to play EQ on a NEC READY 440T and it ran pretty good

----- Original Message -----
From: <MFerrulo@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 11:04 AM
Subject: [EQCheats] EQ and Laptops


> From: MFerrulo@...
>
>
> I am going on the road for 2 weeks and may get a laptop so I can play
while
> travelling. Anyone ever see a EQ played on Laptop? Is it possible? Any
> advice as to what kind of not to expensive laptop to get?
>
> I do not expect the performance of my desk top - just something playable
:)
>
> Wizaro WrathCaster
> Solusek Ro
